meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>warm</kanji> <kanji>degree</kanji>s is how many degrees warm it is in here. Of course, there can be very few warm degrees as well, making it very cold. What is all this? It's the <vocabulary>temperature</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
